value:
$nMPID_カチュア|Princess Minerva is strong, to
be sure, but I think Palla is just
as strong.$k$pOf course, both pale in comparison
to Prince Michalis...

$nMPID_パオラ|Prince Michalis must be gathering
military might to face Dolhr. We must
get stronger so we can help too...

$nMPID_カチュア|If my little sister ever appears tired,
don't worry. Macedon women are
strong. She can handle it.

$nMPID_パオラ|I prefer lances when airborne, but
they can be clumsier than swords
when used for grounded combat...

$nMPID_カチュア|Est has always adored Palla, ever
since she was little. I guess I'm
different... I want to surpass her.

$nMPID_パオラ|I'm Palla of Macedon. I've come with
gifts from $Nf!

$nMPID_パオラ|We will let nothing bad happen to
Macedon! Its future is ours to defend!

$nMPID_パオラ|If the three of us are together, we
have nothing to fear from any enemy!

$nMPID_カチュア|Oh no! That can't be right...
Can I try one more time?

$nMPID_パオラ|I see. We can learn a lot from this.
We will do our best to use it well.

I'm Palla of Macedon, and these are
my younger sisters, Catria and Est.
How can we be of service?

$nMPID_パオラ|Thank you so much for all the many
experiences we've been able to have
on the battlefield with you...$k$pNext to wyvern riders, pegasus
knights are often seen as mere
reconnaissance, but we can fight.$k$p$nMPID_カチュア|Right! And by now, the three of us
together must outmatch even the
strongest wyvern rider.$k$pPrincess Minerva will be quite
pleased, I bet!$k$p$nMPID_パオラ|Now, don't exaggerate, Catria.
Though it is true that we've grown
in both skill and confidence...$k$p$nMPID_カチュア|It's just...Minerva has been so quiet
recently. She used to laugh more...$k$p$nMPID_パオラ|She feels her duty weigh on her...
Maybe we should take on the task
of easing her burden.$k$p$nMPID_カチュア|You're right! As Macedonian
Whitewings, let's help Minerva
however we're able!$k$p$nMPID_パオラ|Together with the fine knight Est
is sure to become, we'll work to
protect the future of Macedon!

$nMPID_パオラ|How are you doing, Catria? Are you
tired, Est?

$nMPID_カチュア|We're doing fine, Palla.
...Est? What is it?
$nMPID_パオラ|How about we head back, then?

$nMPID_カチュア|You're interrupting Palla's training!
This is why I told you to get some
water before we left.
$nMPID_パオラ|Don't be angry, Catria. It's all right.

$nMPID_カチュア|You let her get away with murder,
Palla! Just yesterday, she was hiding
from you so she could eat candy.

$nMPID_パオラ|All right, you two. That's enough.
We'll never become pegasus knights
if you can't get along.

$nMPID_パオラ|Oh, yes. Pegasus knights
must fight as a team. That
requires cooperation.

Take a look around. See how
everyone's lined up perfectly?
Nobody has broken formation.

$nMPID_パオラ|I want us to fly like that, and I believe
that we can. But, well... We're not
quite there yet, are we?
$nMPID_カチュア|I understand. Est, I'm sorry.

$nMPID_パオラ|You're both good girls, aren't you?
Heehee... Someday, you'll grow into
fine pegasus knights.

$nMPID_カチュア|And the three of us will take to the
skies, together.
